channel.title: Nvidia on Shantanu Vs The World
channel.description: Recent content in Nvidia on Shantanu Vs The World

item.title: Creative Open Sources X-Fi Sound Card Driverâ€¦Finally
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: Creative has finally come to its senses and turned to the open source community to raise its X-Fi series of sound cards from the ashes on the linux platform, which got burnt mostly due to the poor quality of the drivers that Creative was giving out. The announcement for releasing the source code, licensed under GPL v2, was made on their forums. For the announcement and download details, click here.

item.title: All Your Base Are Belong To Us - Says Dell
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: Ask any laptop user about how much he liked to kick some butt in Gears of War and he would cringe and cry with agony even before you are able to say the “C” of Crysis. But not anymore. For its notebook consumers, Dell has finally come up with the perfect answer to the questions posed by these ridiculously-difficult-to-get-more-than-10-fps games. Available now is some motherly love for your laps in the form of 8800M GTX with its M1730.
